trans-unit.source: These procedures apply to both automatic snapshot and manual snapshot restore.

seg-source.mrk: These procedures apply to both automatic snapshot and manual snapshot restore.

target.mrk: Ces procédures s'appliquent à la fois à la restauration automatique et manuelle des snapshots.

trans-unit.source: Since all components (home directory, block repositories, database, logs, etc.) are linked together, it is mandatory to restore all components together.

seg-source.mrk: Since all components (home directory, block repositories, database, logs, etc.) are linked together, it is mandatory to restore all components together.

target.mrk: Puisque tous les composants (répertoire d'installation, espaces de stockage de blocs, base de données, logs, etc.) sont liés, il est obligatoire de restaurer ces composants ensemble.

trans-unit.source: Two solutions are available to restore a snapshot:

seg-source.mrk: Two solutions are available to restore a snapshot:

target.mrk: Deux solutions sont disponibles pour restaurer un snapshot :

trans-unit.source: Mount or expose the snapshot and copy files from the snapshot to the current volume.

seg-source.mrk: Mount or expose the snapshot and copy files from the snapshot to the current volume.

target.mrk: Montez ou exposez le snapshot et copiez les fichiers du snapshot vers le volume courant.

trans-unit.source: Revert/restore the whole volume (not for system volumes).

seg-source.mrk: Revert/restore the whole volume (not for system volumes).

target.mrk: Rétablir/restaurer le volume entier (pas pour les volumes système).

trans-unit.source: Before a Restore Operation: in the ade_admin command line interface, run the snap_list command to obtain the list of available snapshots. You must stop the ADE and HyperStream Snapshot services before you start copying any file.

seg-source.mrk: Before a Restore Operation: in the ade_admin command line interface, run the snap_list command to obtain the list of available snapshots.
You must stop the ADE and HyperStream Snapshot services before you start copying any file.

target.mrk: Avant une opération de restauration : dans l'interface en mode commande ade_admin, exécutez la commande snap_list pour obtenir la liste des snapshots disponibles.
Vous devez arrêter les services ADE et HyperStream Snapshot avant de commencer à copier tout fichier.

trans-unit.source: After a Restore Operation: ensure that you restart the ADE and the HyperStream Snapshot services after any restore operation.

seg-source.mrk: After a Restore Operation: ensure that you restart the ADE and the HyperStream Snapshot services after any restore operation.

target.mrk: Après toute opération de restauration : assurez-vous de redémarrer les services ADE et HyperStream Snapshot.
